segments.advisor_message: So let's go over your dependents for retirement planning. Could you tell me their names and any other related info?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, sure! So, I have this, uh, person, my son, his name is, uh, Jake, I think he's, like, turning 22 this year, or maybe next, I... I forget, but, um, he was born on 15-04-2001, I just wrote it down somewhere, you know? And, um, I think, like, he's dependent on me, like, maybe until, um, I dunno, like three more years? Or, uh, until he finishes college or somethin'?
